pos_mean_info_list.mean: 向后的；反向的；发展迟缓的
向后倾斜的；被扫向后面的

word_group.brief_definition: 反向兼容的；向下兼容的

bilingual.source: A hummingbird can fly backwards, which is a unique ability.
bilingual.target: 蜂鸟可以向后飞，这是一个独特的能力。

bilingual.source: Meanwhile, the asocial robot simply moved forwards and backwards and side to side.
bilingual.target: 同时，非社会性机器人只是向前、向后和向两侧移动。

bilingual.source: His car rolled backwards, and in a striking display of irony, hit a sign saying "Rom".
bilingual.target: 他的车向后翻了个身，极具讽刺意味地撞上了一个写着"Rom"的标志。

bilingual.source: She fell backwards but he caught her in his arms.
bilingual.target: 她向后跌倒，但他抓住了她。

bilingual.source: She stepped backwards and fell over a chair.
bilingual.target: 她向后退了一步，摔倒在椅子上。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, the boat is moving backwards. Watch out for the bridge. Oops. Oh, that was close.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，船在向后行驶。小心这座桥呀。差点就撞上了。

yingyinNormal.en: Why can't we go backwards, for once?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们为什么不能倒退，就那么一次？

yingyinNormal.en: Salesman to interns backwards. No, it's not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从推销员倒退到实习生? 不，不是。

yingyinNormal.en: Wear a baseball cap backwards to prove your point?
yingyinNormal.zh: 反戴棒球帽以证明你的改变吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Why can't we go backwards, for once? Backwards, really fast. Fast as we can. Really put the pedal to the metal, you know? Bill and Ted did it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们为什么就不能倒退一次呢？很快的倒退，要多快有多快。把油门真正踩到底？就跟《比尔和泰德历险记》[穿越电影]一样。

yingyinNormal.en: We were told the humans were simple and backwards. It is what we thought.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们被告知人类很简单，很落后，我们原来就是这么想的。

yingyinNormal.en: Because if you're not moving forward, you know you're just moving backwards.
So what would you have us do? Bend over backwards for every single person in the world?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你想让我们怎么做呢？照顾全世界每个人的感受吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Don't just move up and down. Don't just look up. Look backwards, sideways, around corners.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不要只上下移动，不要只往上看，还要往回看，往旁边看，看转角周围。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: That's thinking ahead. The alternative would be to think backwards. That's just remembering.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真会未雨绸缪。换句话说是怎么早没想到，这下记住了。

yingyinNormal.en: Also, this planet is inhabited. But do not worry. The native savages are simple and backwards.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然，这颗星球已经有人定居了，但是别担心，那些土著人落后又天真。

yingyinNormal.en: Well essentially, he won the lottery. Backwards or something. And in another world, I'd look like him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可以理解为，他中奖了。坏事落到他的头上了。换个角度来说，我可能也会中。

yingyinNormal.en: Backwards, really fast. Fast as we can. Really put the pedal to the metal, you know? Go back 10 seconds!
yingyinNormal.zh: 很快的倒退，要多快有多快。把油门真正踩到底？回放10秒钟！

yingyinNormal.en: Number one, knowing your subject backwards and forwards. Two, knowing exactly how you're gonna present it step-by-step.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一：彻底了解你的演讲主题！第二：逐项了解你要呈现的内容。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: I used to watch romantic comedies where the perfect, charming, Hugh-Grant-guy would bend over backwards for the woman that he loves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我以前常常看浪漫喜剧片，片子里像休·格兰特一样完美迷人的男人愿意为自己深爱的女人付出一切。

yingyinNormal.en: She was nine months pregnant with their second child. Two days after his death, she throws herself backwards from a fifth floor window.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她怀着他们已经九个月的第二个孩子，他死了两天以后，她从五楼跳楼自杀。

yingyinNormal.en: Excellent, but when you go into space, you count backwards. Five, four, three, two, one. And then, you have to shout: blast off, as loudly as possible.
yingyinNormal.zh: 非常棒，但是当你要去太空的时候，你要倒着数数。五四三二一。然后，你要大喊：发射，尽可能的大声。

yingyinNormal.en: Prepare extensively for your speech. Know your content backwards and forwards and figure out the absolute best way to present it and do it right over your audience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 做好万全准备！彻底了解你演讲的内容，想出最好的表达方式并呈现给观众。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
